refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the value of a column from SQL result-set.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is actually not a function but a special macro that is converted to a reference to a global parameter.

refsect2.title: column_name
refsect2.para: A string constant (literal, not an expression) that is a column name in plain SQL syntax. It can be a column name (and it can be qualified to specify a table name or an alias name). It can be a name of a Virtuoso/PL variable.
The string should not contain quotes around parts of the column name.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The value of the sql:column() invocation is the value of some SQL column or variable. If the type of the value is not supported by XQuery interpreter then it will be converted according to generic rules for XQuery parameters.
